preqs: For Bachelor of Education in Early Childhood: EDF1052For BEd(Hons) in Early Years and Primary Education: EDF2057

rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {EDF1052}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {EDF1052}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {EDF1052, EDF2057}

description: This unit monitors early years professional experience in the Bachelor of Education in Early Childhood and the Bachelor of Education (Honours). Students complete the required number of days and the activities specified in the unit guide. Students' learning is supported by relevant academic staff in the Faculty of Education, and by teacher mentors in the education setting in which they are placed.
